TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content:
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/49816-rbray89

Another member! Now, to become magically light green.
I should probably post more threads in the actual KSP parts if the forums if I want to ever join this group.
Wow i never noticed that the rep bars turned light green!
Ok, Endersmens needs to be one now. He has a second rep bubble.
Im getting closer....

LOL,

I'm fourth now. Damn you OP for making me care about this!

I should probably post more threads in the actual KSP parts if the forums if I want to ever join this group.

Um, yeah.

Are they in 100's? As in, 100 and 1 points and you get another bubble? I'm at like 89 or something now.

Um, yeah.

Are they in 100's? As in, 100 and 1 points and you get another bubble? I'm at like 89 or something now.

They appear every 100 points until you have your first light green bar at 500; after that they're every 200 points.

There are three new shenanigans entries at the top of the list...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php?order=desc&sort=reputation&pp=30

Edit to add: And Levelord has made the list.

Edited October 25, 2014 by Red Iron Crown

There are three new shenanigans entries at the top of the list...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php?order=desc&sort=reputation&pp=30

Edit to add: And Levelord has made the list.

LOL did Squad add Bill, Bob and Jeb?

LOL did Squad add Bill, Bob and Jeb?

They existed before, but didn't show up in the member list. I fixed that yesterday after Red Iron Crown pointed it out

They existed before, but didn't show up in the member list. I fixed that yesterday after Red Iron Crown pointed it out

And now everyone got knocked down 3 numbers on the list... lol

And now everyone got knocked down 3 numbers on the list... lol

Nah,

We all know where the real list starts.

MJ

I just got two blobs and have a reasonably high rep/post ratio, so maybe if I just spam posts I'll get there (please don't give me sympathy rep). Out of curiosity, is the light green the fabled Badass hex color?
Geshosskopf, Claw and katateochi have earned their light greens.

Updated at last! Sorry for the long delay... I have so much going on right now IRL. Just turned in a massive assignment for Calculus.

Out of curiosity, is the light green the fabled Badass hex color?

I don't think so. The hex color is this... it's a little too light and yellow.

By the way, what's the difference between people whose name is Dark Blue and people whose name is Green? It seems as if they're both moderators... does one group have privileges that the other doesn't?

[EDIT: Never mind, it's in a post right above me. Sorry.]
So, it looks like I have a new goal for myself. Time to become a skilled KSP player, charismatic Youtuber and mod developer!

So, it looks like I have a new goal for myself. Time to become a skilled KSP player, charismatic Youtuber and mod developer!

I can honestly say that none of those things are necessary.

I can honestly say that none of those things are necessary.

Well yeah, but they do help.

Either that or I can just post a lot and get reputation by sheer force of numbers. I'll just hire some chinese guys to post overnight while I'm asleep to maximise my reputation gain rate.

I'll just hire some chinese guys to post overnight while I'm asleep to maximise my reputation gain rate.

Isn't that a teensy bit racist?

Isn't that a teensy bit racist?

I think it has more to do with timezones

Isn't that a teensy bit racist?

China has the largest labour force in the world and is eight hours ahead of my timezone (which is also how long I sleep). It's simply the most logical choice.
Fair enough. It just kinda sounded like you were going: Chinese people are only used for cheap manual labour!!
